title: Dragon armor
summaries: Dragon armor is a Hardmode melee armor set consisting of the Dragon Mask, the Dragon Breastplate and the Dragon Greaves. Each separate piece of Dragon armor has a 11.11*1/9 (11.11%) chance of being dropped by Ocram, or can otherwise be crafted.
A full set of Dragon armor provides the following benefits:

• +60 defense
  • +20% melee damage
  • +15% critical strike chance
  • +38% melee speed
  • +35% movement speed
Additionally, if the full set is visible the player will have an afterimage, similar to Necro armor.
